If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.<br><br>【Fringe Bonus】<br>Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest bonus on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.<br><br>【Null Panic】<br>If unit is inflicted with Panic (bonuses converted into penalties), neutralizes the "converts bonuses on target into penalties" effect for 1 turn.
